Articles.Content:
http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=Planned_features

It\'s out of date now 0.15 is out, Spaceplane hangar should be yellow or green, runway maybe green now, I note the moon can now have the s highlighted, Astronaut Complex is linked to no where.

There may well be things that should be added.

If I remember correctly, I read somewhere on the forums that the Wiki that you linked to is currently under redevelopment. So any recent changes to the game won\'t show up there for a while.

There is a replacement Wiki around, but I can\'t remember the URL.

Edit: I believe this topic should be residing in the \'The Wiki Forum\'.
